title: Celtics' Pritchard honored with Sixth Man award
description: Payton Pritchard, who went from the fringes of the Boston rotation to a constant source of energy and production off the bench, was named the NBA's Sixth Man of the Year.
author: Tim Bontemps

title: Jones: Cowboys working on 'substantive trades'
description: Owner and general manager Jerry Jones said Tuesday the Cowboys are working on "pretty substantive trades" ahead of the NFL draft.
author: Todd Archer

title: Race for the CL: What Opta supercomputer predicts after huge City win
description: The race for Champions League qualification is more competitive than ever with five Premier League teams guaranteed qualification, but which clubs are in the mix?

title: Man Utd given encouragement Cunha keen to join
description: Matheus Cunha has given Manchester United positive indications that he is interested in joining them from Wolves, despite competition to trigger his Â£64m release clause.

title: Passionate Guardiola continues to solve Man City puzzle
description: Pep Guardiola was emotional throughout Manchester City's win over Aston Villa, but may have found another piece of the puzzle.

title: Returning O'Sullivan holds narrow lead over Carter
description: Ronnie O'Sullivan makes a successful return to snooker as he holds the lead in his World Championship first-round match with Ali Carter.

title: Vols run-rule Lipscomb baseball
description: Tennessee baseball hits four home runs in run-rule win against Lipscomb.

title: Mission resumed: Nick Maximov, two surprising releases and determination for a UFC return
description: Nick Diaz Army member Nick Maximov was surprised by his UFC and PFL releases but is determined to get back to the brand that long motivated him.
